permissions: Admins can delete ticket reports. Non-admin users can delete ticket reports for brokers they are members of, and only when the ticket report can be deleted (no dispatches and no performed imports).
side_effects: Deletes the ticket report and, when allowed, destroys related ticket report imports.
validation_notes: The ticket report ID argument is required. --confirm is required to delete. Deletion is blocked when the ticket report is associated with ticket report dispatches or performed ticket report imports.
